content: Multi-sport event in Singapore The **1973 Southeast Asian Peninsular Games**, officially known as the **7th Southeast Asian Peninsular Games**, were a Southeast Asian multi-sport event held in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) from 1 to 8 September 1973 with 16 sports featured in the games. This was the first time Singapore hosted the games. Singapore is the fourth nation to host the Southeast Asian Games after Thailand, Burma and Malaysia. The games was opened and closed by Benjamin Sheares, the President of Singapore at the Singapore National Stadium. The final medal tally was led by Thailand, followed by host Singapore and Malaysia. ## The games ### Participating nations - [Burma](/wiki/Myanmar) - [Khmer Republic](/wiki/Khmer_Republic) - [Laos](/wiki/Laos) - [Malaysia](/wiki/Malaysia) - [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) **(host)** - [South Vietnam](/wiki/South_Vietnam) - [Thailand](/wiki/Thailand) ### Sports - Aquatics ([details](/wiki/Aquatics_at_the_1973_SEAP_Games)) - [Athletics](/wiki/Sport_of_athletics) ([details](/wiki/Athletics_at_the_1973_SEAP_Games)) - [Badminton](/wiki/Badminton) ([details](/wiki/Badminton_at_the_1973_SEAP_Games)) - [Basketball](/wiki/Basketball) (details) - [Boxing](/wiki/Boxing) ([details](/wiki/Boxing_at_the_1973_SEAP_Games)) - [Cycling](/wiki/Cycle_sport) ([details](/wiki/Cycling_at_the_1973_SEAP_Games)) - [Football](/wiki/Association_football) ([details](/wiki/Football_at_the_1973_SEAP_Games)) - [Hockey](/wiki/Ice_hockey) (details) - [Judo](/wiki/Judo) ([details](/wiki/Judo_at_the_1973_SEAP_Games)) - [Sailing](/wiki/Sailing_(sport)) (details) - [Sepak takraw](/wiki/Sepak_takraw) (details) - [Shooting](/wiki/Shooting_sports) ([details](/wiki/Shooting_at_the_1973_SEAP_Games)) - [Table tennis](/wiki/Table_tennis) ([details](/wiki/Table_tennis_at_the_1973_SEAP_Games)) - [Tennis](/wiki/Tennis) ([details](/wiki/Tennis_at_the_1973_SEAP_Games)) - [Volleyball](/wiki/Volleyball) (details) - [Weightlifting](/wiki/Olympic_weightlifting) ([details](/wiki/Weightlifting_at_the_1973_SEAP_Games)) ## Medal table * Host nation (Singapore) RankNationGoldSilverBronzeTotal1 Thailand (THA)472527992 Singapore (SIN)*4550451403 [Malaysia](/wiki/Malaysia_at_the_1973_Southeast_Asian_Peninsular_Games) (MAS)3035501154 Burma (BIR)282415675 Khmer Republic (KHM)91230516 South Vietnam (VNM)21310257 Laos (LAO)0549Totals (7 entries)161164181506 -
